front.title: LMP, LDP and RSVP Extensions for Optical UNI Signaling

abstract.t: The Optical Interworking Forum (OIF) has defined extensions to the Link Management Protocol (LMP), the Label Distribution Protocol (LDP) and the Resource reServation Protocol (RSVP) for optical User Network Interface (UNI) signaling. These extensions consist of a set of new messages and data objects. This draft describes these extensions.
